label: HelpActivity
text: To add a text to favourites list just press bright yellow 'Star' icon next to the text. Press it again to remove it from favorties. How to add text to favourites? In the text app you can share your favourite text in Facebook SMS and more. From text page press the share button on top and select Facebook. You will see a login window where you can enter your login credentionals and share the text. How can I share the text? Please make sure that the app is installed on your device's internal memory. If it is on the external storage you need to move it to phone's Settings/Applications/Manage Applications/... and click on 'Move to phone'. I cannot find the text widget
